casebody.data:
In re PEDESTRIAN WALKWAY FAILURE.
Sandra D. MELTON, and husband, Robert Morris Melton, Jr. and Robert Christopher Melton
v.
TINDALL CORPORATION, formerly, Tindall Concrete Products, Inc. No. 596P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 26, 2006. Mona Lisa Wallace, Salisbury, Cathy A. Williams, K. Edward Greene, Raleigh, for Robert C. Melton. Robert J. King, III, Reid J. King, III, Reid L. Phillips, Greensboro, for Tindall Corporation.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 25th day of October 2005 by Plaintiff (Robert Christopher Melton) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 26th day of January 2006."

Justice MARTIN recused.
